testcase.name: it should display the extension
TODO: tests for loader
it should have section headings
it should display top sites
it should display latest bookmarks
TODO: it should display recently closed items
TODO: it should display items from other devices
it should have navbar
navbar should have visibility off -button
visibility-on -button should be hidden
clicking visibility off -button should hide all elements
clicking visibility off -button should hide it
clicking visibility off -button should make visibility on -button appear
the state of visibility off should persist between sessions
clicking visibility on -button should make all elements visible
clicking visibility on -button should hide it
clicking visibility on -button should make visibility-off -button appear
it should have button to view bookmarks
clicking bookmark button should take to bookmark-page
it should have button to view history
clicking history button should take to history-page
it should have button to view downloads
clicking downloads button should take to downloads-page
it should have button to open incognito-window
